entry.title: Blinding Truth
entry.summary:
Author: Holdt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,452Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: When Bruce Wayne's parents are assassinated for his reform proposals, his uncontrolled spirit-magic nearly kills him. Death-servant Clark abandons his sacred duty to save Bruce's life‚Äîcondemning a spirit to shadow-eternity and losing his own sight in a failed purification ritual. Now forsaken by his people and able to see only magic and mortality, Clark must keep Bruce's wild power from burning him out while wetlands warriors train them both for revolution. Bruce will return to Gotham to destroy the old guard families who murdered his parents. But first, he has to be worth everything Clark sacrificed.

entry.title: How to Investigate a Bat's Heart
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,424Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 461

Summary: Bruce Wayne has been acting‚Ä¶strange. Disappearing on nights when there‚Äôs no patrol, coming home looking suspiciously glowy, and receiving mysterious gifts at the manor‚Äôs doorstep‚Äîflowers, pies, baskets of fresh fruit. To Dick, it‚Äôs obvious: Bruce has finally discovered a wholesome hobby.To Jason, it‚Äôs clearer: Bruce is definitely hooking up with someone.To Damian, it‚Äôs undeniable: they‚Äôre about to get a new sibling if no one figures this out fast. Determined not to be left in the dark, the Wayne brothers launch a secret investigation into their father‚Äôs suspicious behavior. Between banter, botched surveillance, and the constant risk of Bruce catching them in the act, the trio will uncover more than just a mystery‚Äîthey‚Äôll learn a little about family, love, and how far they‚Äôll go to protect the Bat.

entry.title: For Once In My Life
entry.summary:
Author: bobeepop

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,546Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 57

Summary: And Bruce laughed, actually laughed. He thought for a moment that he was either dreaming and this whole day has been too good to be true or that he had unfortunately passed away and is now in heaven. ‚ÄúIt's mine actually.‚Äù holding out a light blue mug with ‚ÄúThe Daily Planet‚Äù in bright red lettering‚Äì wait he knows this cup, it's the cup that he thought he lost when he moved apartments a few years ago. Feeling a swirl of emotions, he‚Äôs unsure how he‚Äôs supposed to respond. Choking on his own spit, Clark stammers out, ‚ÄúI-Is that mine?‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat? No, Jason got it for me about 2 years ago for Father‚Äôs Day.‚Äù Bruce says, amused and a little confused, with an incredulous expression displayed on his face. He really was going crazy. Why would Batman take his cup and then lie about it? Or Bruce figures out that he might like Clark, while the man in question has spent the last 4 years pining after him.

entry.title: Safe and Sound
entry.summary:
Author: Boltbot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 148,067Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 1,920

Summary: Bruce opened his eyes. A red cape rippled in the wind above him. A gold symbol‚Äîbold, and bright‚Äîstood out against the deep blue of a suit that barely seemed real. And then the face. Calm, focused, and unabashedly kind. Superman. ‚ÄúYou alright?‚Äù the hero asked, voice deep and sure, like the world wasn‚Äôt ending around them. Bruce blinked, not sure what surprised him more‚Äîthe fact that he was alive, or the man who‚Äôd made sure of it. ‚ÄúI-I am now,‚Äù he muttered, mind still scrambling after the fall. Superman‚Äôs smile was subtle, but real. ‚ÄúYou know, I never get tired of hearing that.‚Äù And just like that, Bruce Wayne‚Äîwho‚Äôd accepted death‚Äîwas held in the arms of something he didn‚Äôt believe in. entry.title: HAIL MARY
entry.summary:
Author: sleepyteatimebear

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,317Chapters: 4/32Kudos: 35

Summary: Clark 'Superman' Kent, is a shoe-in for the NFL draft, a tall, dimpled, All-American-Type, College Football's Jesus. Bruce is well-known for his intense dedication to collegiate journalism, his all-black closet and the billions promised to him upon graduation. Bruce wants to sweep at the Collegiate Emmy's, Clark wants to go pro. So, they make a deal. Bruce can produce a media campaign that rallies the public behind Clark before Draft Day. Bruce helps to upkeep the Wayne Media Enterprise legacy, and Clark gets good press. But then, Clark and Bruce spend game-day after game-day together. Bruce asks Clark questions, studies him, captures him, writes all of him down. What's even more peculiar is Clark starts asking questions back. Questions that make Bruce feel like Clark wants to know him as more than just his shadow for the season. They can‚Äôt fall in love. It wouldn‚Äôt make practical sense. It wouldn‚Äôt make emotional sense. But couldn't it?

entry.title: what's in a name?
entry.summary:
Author: icantcountthereasonsishouldstay

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,294Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Clark has waited his whole life for his soulmate's name, wondering if he'll even have one. But when a nonsensical phrase appears on his wrist, he's devastated. What on earth is Batman? Later, he meets the charismatic and vapid Bruce Wayne. But Clark soon realizes there's more to Bruce than meets the eye, and he starts falling for the gorgeous millionaire, all but forgetting his soulmate. When he does meet his supposed soulmate, Batman is cold and aloof, leaving Clark more confused than ever. Clark is torn. He likes Bruce, but he's still drawn to Batman, despite the Dark Knight's coldness towards him. Clark thinks Batman hates him, but that couldn't be further from the truth. Bruce isn't concerned with soulmates. Nothing matters except his mission. He barely cares when the name appears. But when he discovers a connection between his soulmate and the mysterious new meta the news is calling Superman, he decides to do some digging, starting with Clark Kent. He invites him to one of the Wayne Galas, and he's immediately struck by how gorgeous Clark is. As he and Clark get closer, Bruce starts to feel guilty. Clark can never know that they're soulmates or his secret identity. That still doesn't stop him from wanting more.

Hal continued to gape at Clark. ‚ÄúThe man has fallen into not one but two wedding cakes.‚Äù ‚ÄúSee, he‚Äôs harmless!‚Äù ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî The Justice League play Fuck, Marry, Kill. Hal begins to rethink Superman‚Äôs critical thinking skills. Barry is just grateful for the team bonding moment. And Bruce is extremely amused by the whole situation... until he isn't.

entry.title: all my pasts and futures
entry.summary:
Author: bat_got_your_tongue

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,480Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 238

Summary: Bruce gets tossed around the multiverse, only switching to the next universe upon his death. He wakes up in yet another new universe... this time in Clark Kent's bed.
